when he searches for the Miami Dolphins' missing mascot. (PG-13) 1 hr. 26 mins. Paramount Wed. 2 a.m. Action 
Point (2018) Johnny Knoxville, Chris Pontius. D.C. is the crackpot owner of a low-rent amusement park where the 
rides are designed with minimum safety for maximum fun. When a corporate mega-park opens nearby, D.C. and 
his loony crew of misfits must pull out all the stops to try and save the day. (R) 1 hr. 25 mins. EPIX Tues. 6:25 a.m.
